title: New: Pandit – Steady Nerves and a Strong Heart EP
body:
Just 2 days ago [**Pandit**](http://www.facebook.com/musicpandit) released his new EP, entitled _Steady Nerves and a Strong Heart,_ an EP that was apparently recorded within one night. At times it’s hardly surprising, the whole thing is soaked in a layer of emotional outcry and frustration, amongst an atmosphere that focuses on sweeping vistas and confused yet determined visions.

The whole EP is available for free download **[here.](http://download345.mediafire.com/v4zzk2ys183g/lgfgbzuzf0l0djf/Steady+Nerves+and+a+Strong+Heart.zip)**
